20 // DECLARATION OF STRUCTUREDGRID
21 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
22 class V_COREEXPORT StructuredGrid: public Coords, virtual public StructuredGridBase, virtual public CelltreeInterface<3> {
23  V_OBJECT(StructuredGrid);
24 
25 public:
26  typedef Coords Base;
27  typedef typename CelltreeInterface<3>::Celltree Celltree;
28 
29  // constructor
30  StructuredGrid(const Index numVert_x, const Index numVert_y, const Index numVert_z, const Meta &meta = Meta());
31 
32  // get functions for metadata
33  Index getNumDivisions(int c) override { return d()->numDivisions[c]; }
34  Index getNumDivisions(int c) const override { return m_numDivisions[c]; }
35  Index getNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos) override;
36  Index getNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos) const override;
37  Index getGlobalIndexOffset(int c) const override { return d()->indexOffset[c]; }
38  void setGlobalIndexOffset(int c, Index offset) override;
39 
40  // virtual set functions
41  void setNumGhostLayers(unsigned dim, GhostLayerPosition pos, unsigned value) override;
42 
43  // GridInterface
44  Index getNumVertices() const override;
45  std::pair<Vector, Vector> getBounds() const override;
46  Normals::const_ptr normals() const override;
47  void setNormals(Normals::const_ptr normals);
48  std::pair<Vector, Vector> cellBounds(Index elem) const override;
49  Index findCell(const Vector &point, Index hint=InvalidIndex, int flags=NoFlags) const override;
50  bool inside(Index elem, const Vector &point) const override;
51  Interpolator getInterpolator(Index elem, const Vector &point, DataBase::Mapping mapping=DataBase::Vertex, InterpolationMode mode=Linear) const override;
52 
53  bool hasCelltree() const override;
54  Celltree::const_ptr getCelltree() const override;
55  bool validateCelltree() const override;
56  Scalar exitDistance(Index elem, const Vector &point, const Vector &dir) const override;
57 
58  void copyAttributes(Object::const_ptr src, bool replace = true) override;
59 
60 private:
61  // mutable pointers to ShmVectors
62  mutable Index m_numDivisions[3];
63  mutable Index m_ghostLayers[3][2];
64  mutable Celltree::const_ptr m_celltree;
65 
66  void createCelltree(Index dims[]) const;
67 
68  // data object
69  V_DATA_BEGIN(StructuredGrid);
70 
71  shm_obj_ref<Normals> normals;
72  Index indexOffset[3]; //< global index offset
73  Index numDivisions[3]; //< number of divisions on each axis (1 more than number of cells)
74  Index ghostLayers[3][2]; //< number of ghost cell layers in each of x, y, z directions
75 
76  Data(const Index numVert_x, const Index numVert_y, const Index numVert_z, const std::string & name, const Meta &meta = Meta());
77  ~Data();
78  static Data *create(const Index numVert_x = 0, const Index numVert_y = 0, const Index numVert_z = 0, const Meta &meta = Meta());
79 
80  V_DATA_END(StructuredGrid);
81 };
